Watchtower AI | Data Science, Backend and Systems Engineers, Full-stack | San Francisco & Palo Alto | ONSITE, REMOTE, INTERNS Welcome | https://watchtower.ai

Watchtower is a data security startup dedicated to helping enterprises discover, classify, and protect sensitive data across their cloud footprint - their corporate SaaS, data infrastructure, and APIs - via machine learning.

⁃We’re looking for folks passionate about working at the intersection of deep learning, information security, and distributed systems. ⁃Tech Stack: Go, Node.js, React, Python, Cassandra, Redis, Terraform, Docker, Kubernetes. ⁃Well funded by top-tier VC investors who have invested in and operated at major cybersecurity companies.

We would love to hear from you - please reach out to us at careers@watchtower.ai with a brief intro or any questions you may have.
